titles.title: Community Colleges and Universities Safety Grant Act
Community Colleges and Universities Safety Grant Act
To direct the Attorney General to make campus law enforcement agencies eligible for certain grants, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
Community Colleges and Universities Safety Grant Act
This bill makes a campus law enforcement agency eligible to apply for any program or grant that is administered by the Department of Justice for which a state law enforcement agency or local law enforcement agency is eligible to apply.
